abstract: Just four months after Rupert Murdoch took control of Dow Jones, the parent company of The Wall Street Journal, the newspaper’s top editor, Marcus W. Brauchli, is expected to step down, according to reports.
lead_paragraph: Just four months after Rupert Murdoch took control of Dow Jones, the parent company of The Wall Street Journal, the newspaper’s top editor, Marcus W. Brauchli, is expected to step down, according to reports.

headline.main: Wall Street Journal Editor Expected to Resign
